stories.text:
How would you best diff two csv-s in 2021 ?
And not just full matches, column by column too.
Especially if you want to compare many thousands of rows.
stories.title: Ask HN: Interactive CSV Diffing Tool?

stories.text:
Can the wordpress back office still run well with 100k pages? Did anyone do this in combination with ACF ?

My use case: I do static page generation with Elder JS and I need content creators to be able to contribute and edit content. ACF would be really practical to set up the data structures I need.
stories.title: Ask HN: Using wordpress as a CMS with 100k pages
A ’00s College Debate Team Predicted Today’s Culture Wars
Show HN: Hourly notifications to prime you do to more of the stuff you want

stories.text:
Hey all, I’m finishing up on one of my projects which required integrating PayPal login to avoid dealing with authentication security. (https://developer.paypal.com/docs/api/identity/v1/)

I just wanted to see if this code is of value to anyone else looking for a short and sweet authentication method? I recognize this is a very stripped down method compared to the likes of auth0 but it may be all that’s needed.

For those who find possible value in it, what price point would be a good deal for you?

Thanks in advance!
stories.title: Ask HN: Would you pay for PayPal Identity Authentication code?
